Package org.dlw.ai.blackboard.util

Package containing class utilities.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BlackboardUtil This class is used to provide utility functions for the blackboard object.
KnowledgeSourceConstants This class is used to provide static constants for naming knowledge sources
Logger This class is used to wrap and protect log-level use
MessageConstants This class is used to maintain all Strings that are used for informational messages while logging.
ReflectionUtil  
RuleSetConstants This class is used to provide static constants for naming persisted rule sets
SentenceUtil This class is used to provide utility functions for sentence blackboard objects.
StringTrimmer This class is used to provide string utility functions for trimming String objects.
SystemConstants This utility class provides string constants for system level needs.
SystemUtil This utility class provides runtime thread processes for audible system output in addition to console or file level logging.
UniversalContext This class is used as a universal utility that can provide access to the Spring application context, statically, from anywhere in the application.
 

Package org.dlw.ai.blackboard.util Description

Package containing class utilities.

Since:
1.0
